fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Rampage at a player's house at night with an unloaded shotgun.
- Since you can't kill anyone, instead you just intimidate all players at that house into saying their faction. You learn the faction of that player and all their visitors, but you don't know which results belong to who. You don't learn the names of visitors.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you visit a player who dies that night, you load your shotgun with dropped bullets, gaining one charge of a basic attack at night. You may use this charge to deal a basic attack to any player instead of your normal night action.
